Professional Summary

  • Adept tech reporter with a strong background in Chinese consumer hardware and gaming narratives.
  • Academically trained in Journalism and Communication from the University of Shanghai for Science and Technology.
  • Garnered hands-on experience reviewing dozens of gadgets, showcasing a keen eye for detail and technical knowledge.
  • Dynamic and adaptable with a flair for innovative problem-solving and effective communication.
  • Expert in Matter, the unified smart home standard.

Work experience

Portfolio links available with each position.
Products Editor & Writer - MatterAlpha
December 2024 - Present | Part-time

Matter is a unified smart home standard to bring all brands together locally and securely. Major brands including Apple, Samsung, Amazon, and Google are major promoters of the standard.

  • File in database for Matter-enabled smart home products.
  • Pitch and write up stories about Matter.

Overseas Content Planner - eWeLink (smart home solution provider)
December 2023 - March 2025 | Full-time

  • Manage eWeLink official forum site.
  • Write user guides.
  • Edited product text provided by product managers and translators for accuracy, clarity, and consistency.
  • Follow up product development progress and write up PR copy for distribution.
  • Research in rival products and assist product team to plan product updates in early phases.
  • Assist testing team to troubleshoot and debug from user’s perspective.

Tech reporter/Gadget Writer - PingWest
April 2023 - November 2023 | Full-time

  • Pitch and file daily news brieives and features in the Chinese hardware industry.
  • Review gadgets from Chinese vendors, including audio devices, smartphones, smart home, and XR.
  • Undertook product photography to complement reviews, enhancing article engagement.

Tech reporter - Caixin Global
December 2022 - March 2023 | Full-time

  • Pitch and file daily and feature stories with style based on AP.
  • Report stories based on Caixin’s Chinese ones, with reworking and extra works to have it readable for English native speakers.

Tech reporter - TechNode
February 2022 - December 2022 | Full-time

  • Pitch and file stories with AP style on both daily and long-term deadlines.
  • Upload articles and work with SEO optimization.
  • Connect with major Chinese consumer electronics makers and review products. Also responsible for product photography sometimes.
  • Help to develop tools to improve team workflow.

Contributor - NetEase
September 2019 - Present | Part-time

  • Work with editors, designers, and programmers to collect data and write data-driven articles for the DataBlog channel (NetEase shu du, in Chinese).
  • File commercial content with NetEase’s clients.
  • Work on a short video channel with over a million subscribers across all platforms, managing tasks, translating, and making videos.

Editor - Fortune China
June 2021 - September 2021 | Internship

  • Work with the Chinese team to do localization of content from the US site, translating, and recompressing subtitles for videos.
  • Help to operate their official Weibo account.
  • Assist with plans to market Fortune 500.
  • Do data visualization for Fortune 500 analytical articles.
  • Write short business comments for their UGC platform Fortune Plus.
  • Produce video content for Fortune’s events.

Data Journalist - The Paper
May 2020 - September 2020 | Internship

  • Assisted in producing data stories in all forms, including H5, video and article.
  • Scripts writing, data process (collect, label and analyze), assisting designer in working on data graphics.

T-shaped skills set with proficiencies in content creation, data analysis, and media production.

Media & writing

  • Have PR connections with major Chinese hardware vendors and gaming firms.
  • A typical Gen-Z and a heavy user of both Chinese and English social media with sharp intuition of news ideas.
  • Familiar with WordPress backend.

Programming

  • Beginner of frondend development with knowloadge of JS, CSS, and common JS libraries.
  • Beginner of backend operation and maintance with capality to build website, and deploy apps with Docker and Linux(CentOS prefered) with ssh.

Creative creation

  • Expert in Adobe Creative suits, including Photoshop, illustrator, and Indesign. Capable of creating stunning data visdulization and neat publications with them.
